Title: Episode 5
Plot: A football fan is killed, and Sam fears further violence in the run up to an important local derby. He and DCI Hunt mount an undercover operation in a pub to catch the suspects. Sam realises that the match is the last one he attended with his father.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Michael Lawrence (IX), Ian Barritt, Anthony Flanagan, Kris Mochrie, Steven Blower, John Wilson (V), Joe Duttine, John R. Walker
